ygData.subject: Re: Places to hunt for a lvl 13 or above wizard....
ygData.msgSnippet: I m not sure of the address off the top of my head, but go to the site that runs the message list, change your subscription to the [eq_wizards] list to
ygData.messageBody:
I'm not sure of the address off the top of my head, but go to the site that runs
the message list, change your "subscription" to the [eq_wizards] list to Digest
version.. I'm not sure, but I think the digest version is one huge email per
day, instead of 10 or 15 an hour.. :)

> From: "Matthew VanAndel"<scriven@...>
>
> Ok, I have had quite enough of this. An EQ-Wizards newsletter is one thing.
> An EQ-Wizards mega-messageboard that is delivered straight to your e-mail is
> another. I NEED to be able to go through my e-mail without having to sift
> through 100+ EQ-Wizards e-mails a day. PLEASE! FOR THE LOVE OF GOD, REMOVE
> ME! REMOVE! REMOVE! REMOVE! IIIIiiiiieeeeeeeeeeeee!!!!
